properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:20PM MST until February 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing snow occurring. Periods of snow along the divide,
with snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches on Highway 2 from East
Glacier Park to Marias Pass. Winds gusting near 60 mph.

* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front.

* WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of snow are likely to continue
through the weekend in the mountains.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST FRIDAY
